column4: why with ose does it have to download the modules when with sun you can recompile them...?
you can recompile the virtualbox modules, too (I can't give you instructions, though)
cus with sun its as simple as synaptic > find and highlight virtualbox > menu "Packages" configure..   click next until you see something about "compile modules now?" and make sure its checked...
not only does it not support postscript -- it relies on a proprietary feature of Windows, called GDI
